# scaleway_key_manager_key_encrypt_action (Action)

<!-- action schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `key_id` (String) ID of the key to use for encryption. The key must have an usage set to `symmetric_encryption` or `asymmetric_encryption`. (UUID format)

- `plaintext` (String) Plaintext data to encrypt. Data size must be between 1 and 65535 bytes.

### Optional

- `associated_data` Additional authenticated data. Additional data which will not be encrypted, but authenticated and appended to the encrypted payload. Only supported by keys with a usage set to `symmetric_encryption`.
    - `value` (String) Value of the associated data

- `region` (String) Region of the key. If not set, the region is derived from the key_id when possible or from the provider configuration.
